data.title: Mark Munch Net Worth, Biography, and Insider Trading
data.meta_description: Have questions about Bruker VP Mark Munch? View Dr. Munch's net worth, biography, salary, age, and recent stock transactions at InsiderTrades.com.
data.text:
The estimated net worth of Mark Munch is at least $6.16 million as of September 16th, 2019. Dr. Munch owns 96,063 shares of Bruker stock worth more than $6,155,717 as of July 24th. This net worth approximation does not reflect any other investments that Dr. Munch may own. Additionally, Dr. Munch receives an annual salary of $1,630,000.00 as VP at Bruker. Learn More about Mark Munch's net worth.

Dr. Munch is currently 62 years old. There are 6 older executives and no younger executives at Bruker. The oldest executive at Bruker is Mr. Juergen Srega, President of Bruker CALID Group & Bruker Daltonics Division, who is 69 years old. Learn More on Mark Munch's age.

As the VP of Bruker Co., Dr. Munch earns $1,630,000.00 per year. The highest earning executive at Bruker is Dr. Frank H. Laukien Ph.D., Chairman, CEO & President, who commands a salary of $1,820,000.00 per year. Learn More on Mark Munch's salary.

The corporate mailing address for Dr. Munch and other Bruker executives is 40 Manning Road, Billerica MA, 01821. Bruker can also be reached via phone at (978) 663-3660 and via email at [email protected]. Learn More on Mark Munch's contact information.

Mark Munch has not been actively trading shares of Bruker in the last ninety days. Most recently, Mark Munch sold 21,210 shares of the business's stock in a transaction on Wednesday, December 15th. The shares were sold at an average price of $79.47, for a transaction totalling $1,685,558.70. Learn More on Mark Munch's trading history.
